description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to further describe an observation definition that is characterized as a challenge observation. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OM1 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0257 (Nature of Challenge)

description.value: A code that indicates the status of the concept
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST

definition.value: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST

display.value: Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)

definition.value: Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)

display.value: No fluid intake for the period specified in the time component of the term

definition.value: No fluid intake for the period specified in the time component of the term
